img_summary: The image depicts a small stone bowl containing reddish-brown seeds, likely representing Gentian Seeds from the video game *Black Myth: Wukong*. According to the context, Gentian Seeds are classified as "Uncommon" and are obtained randomly while collecting Gentian plants. The image is part of a guide detailing collectible items and their uses within the game.
